lead_paragraph: POPPER--Beatrice G.,PhD, 92 years, of Floral Park, N.Y., passed away on March 1. Betty was the loving wife of 51 years to the late Walter, sister of the late Theodore Barnett, M.D. and devoted and adored mother of Holly (deceased), Steven and Joseph, and their wives Janet and Cheryl. She adored her grandchildren Aimie, Emily, Rachel, Jessie, Ben and Julia. She loved and cherished her caretakers Bridgette Ivy and Karen Lee. Betty attended Brooklyn College, received her doctorate from New York University, and was Professor of Speech, and chairman of the department, at City College of New York. Until her death she continued to tutor English as a second language. She was an ardent Democrat, committed philanthropist, a bridge player extraordinaire and loyal friend to many. We will always love and miss her dearly. Funeral will be Friday 10am at Gutterman's Inc., 175 N. Long Beach Rd., Rockville Centre, NY. In lieu of flowers, please make contributions to the Holly T. Popper Scholarship Fund at City College. 1/3
